tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: \"I had approached 'Dental Care center' with my friends suggestion. First, I am very much satisfied with doctor's advice, adhering and flexibility in timings. Results are good and is as expected\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Good guidance and effective treatment. I had visited the clinic for alignment of teeth. The doctor explained to me in detail about the invisible aligners and I’m very happy with the results.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am old patient  of Dr Nalini, I am a satisfied customer 
I always remember the best treatment given to by Dr Nalini, though I reside in Dharwad I prefer to visit Bangalore/Dr Nalini for any of my dental problems 
I once again convey my sincere thanks to Dr Nalini and the team for the excellent treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
On enquiry before going to the clinic, Dr. Nalini sent a detailed explanation of the extra caution exercised during these times of Corona Virus, which was extremely useful.
Also, on arrival, extreme care was taken to follow all procedures and the relief on the face of the patient was palpable.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Have been going here since 5th grade for braces. Had 2 premolar extractions, and after removal of braces, not happy with my smile it looks wierd. My face has become extremely flat and ended up with a slight lisp. Also, she had made me wear braces for 6 years when the prescribed time is 3 years, for no good reason and I ended up with cavities after removing them. Would not recommend coming here for braces.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Nalini is an excellent doctor who explains the issue patiently and offers an appropriate  treatment
